ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of ERIC HOSKINS, O.C., of Toronto, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Minister of Health and the Minister of Finance, to serve as Chairperson of the Advisory Council on the Implementation of National Pharmacare (the Council), to hold office during pleasure for a term ending January 31, 2019, effective February 28, 2018.
